name: Chicken Fork: A Fishblade Game
description:
People who’ve played the original Fishblade will be well aware of the concept of utensil-related roleplaying.

Chicken Fork is a similar spin on the concept but ‘forking off’ in a slightly different direction.

Play with up to 6 players in an intense romp around the table. You don't need no stinking dice; you barely even need a DM.

If it makes you smirk, check out my other games and buy me a cup of coffee.
